metadata.title: CVE-2023-51780 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in the Linux kernel before 6.6.8. do_vcc_ioctl innet/atm/ioctl.c has a use-after-free because of a vcc_recvmsg racecondition.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-51780` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-5.4.0-173-generic - 5.4.0-173.191
linux-image-5.4.0-173-generic-lpae - 5.4.0-173.191
linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-173-generic - 5.4.0-173.191
linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-173-lowlatency - 5.4.0-173.191
No subscription required

linux-image-5.15.0-97-generic - 5.15.0-97.107~20.04.1
linux-image-5.15.0-97-generic-lpae - 5.15.0-97.107~20.04.1
